name: Cut'Hem
description:
Casual style Audio Game. The objective is to rotate and destroy the enemies before they reach the player, by facing them in the correct direction.

For better gaming experience use headphones and download one of the versions available.

Controls

Rotate to the Left: A Key (Keyboard) / Left D-Pad (Gamepad)

Rotate to the Right: D Key (Keyboard) / Right D-Pad (Gamepad)

Attack: Enter (Keyboard) / South Button (Gamepad)

Accessibility Features

  • Input Configuration
  • UI Contrast and Font Size Configuration
  • Screen Reader
  • Difficulty Levels
  • Tutorial
  • Gamepad and Keyboard controls
  • Other Settings Configuration
